title: Drawing, "Rosenfeld: Bed and Night Table", September 10, 1935
medium: Graphite, black ink, red, blue, and green color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8397/F.S./KOTZIAN/RHU(?)/9/10/35, 9/11/35, 1, SHK; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description:
Plans and elevations for bed and night table. Long, rectangular headboard in yuba wood with vertical grain; lacquered night table at left with rounded right edge. Bed extends from headboard and footboard at end in yuba wood; base of bed in lacquer. Shelves at right of bed

Night table opens from right; moveable shelves inside cabinet. Reflector light on top of night table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rosenfeld: Bed and Night Table", September 10, 1935.
September 10, 1935. Graphite, black ink, red, blue, and green color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-1000.
